Item ID5576

The initiate cuisse is a piece of initiate armour from the Temple Knights that requires 20 Defence, 10 Prayer, and completion of Recruitment Drive to equip. It provides a small prayer bonus that matches the monk's robe, while retaining the defensive bonuses of mithril platelegs.

It can be bought from Sir Tiffy Cashien after completion of Recruitment Drive for 8,000 or purchased for 4,422 on the Grand Exchange.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The cuisse's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -7 to -11.

20 September 2006
(update)

The item was renamed from "Initiate platelegs" to "Initiate cuisse".

17 October 2005
(update)

The item was graphically updated with the release of Wanted!

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Initiate and Proselyte armour are commonly used during slayer tasks that require the use of protection prayers, as their substantial prayer bonuses help reduce the drain of prayer points.
